mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, user_profile_image AS userProfileImage, user_login_id AS userLoginId FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, d.dept_name AS deptname, r.rank_name AS rankname FROM user u JOIN dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN ranks r ON u.rank_id = r.rank_id WHERE u.user_status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY d.dept_name ASC, r.rank_level DESC, u.user_name ASC
